sentences.english: Many schools around the country have adopted similar coursework.
sentences.chinese: 全國許多學校創立了相似的課程。

sentences.english: During the first half of this year, the country added a total of 26 million new Internet users.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，全國的網民增加了兩千六百萬。

sentences.english: Make your records available to the local and national record committees.
sentences.chinese: 將自己的紀錄提供給地區或是全國性的紀錄委員會。

sentences.english: How should we evaluate China's educational work in the first 17 years?
sentences.chinese: 對全國教育戰線十七年的工作怎樣估計？

sentences.english: His fame spread throughout the country.
The wedding expenses in Shanghai are among the highest in the country.

sentences.english: Professional building in the country with a demonstration effect.
sentences.chinese: 專業的建設在全國帶有一定的示範作用。

sentences.english: Shanghai provides direst flights to more than 60 cities in the world.
sentences.chinese: 上海的國際航班可直達全國上60多座都會。

sentences.english: John's about to start a nine-week national speaking tour.
sentences.chinese: 約翰即將展開一場歷時九周的全國巡迴演講。

sentences.english: Products to local market and exported to international markets.
sentences.chinese: 產品行銷全國各地，並出口國際市場。

sentences.english: National-wide, females claim 38% of the total number of cadres.
sentences.chinese: 全國女幹部的比例已佔幹部總數的38%以上。

sentences.english: Appears in the newspapers, the national only environment deodorizes the laboratory to settle down Jinmen.
sentences.chinese: 報載，全國唯一的環境“除臭”實驗室落戶津門。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee attended the abovementioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地參加了上述活動。

sentences.english: They are already poaching our staff from our branches across the country.
sentences.chinese: 他們現在已經在全國範圍內挖角我們的人才。

sentences.english: Our club has affiliated with a national society.
sentences.chinese: 我們俱樂部已與一個全國性協會合並。

sentences.english: Hexi corridor was named one of the commodity grain base in China and granary bam of Gansu province.
